item.title: Understanding year notations – BC, BCE, AD, and CE
item.description: In order to know and understand the events in history, it is vital to understand the timeline. To understand timeline, it is important to decode the denotations for years. I mean understanding the full form and meaning of terms BC, BCE, AD and CE. Before we being, it is important to understand the concept of an “year”. An “year” that is universally accepted and followed comes from the Georgian Calendar (also commonly known as “Christian” or “Western” calendar).
